statements: UPDATE SculptureRestorationRecords SET restoration_type = 'Cleaning', conservator_name = 'John Doe' WHERE record_id = 1;

UPDATE SculptureRestorationRecords SET conservator_name = 'John Doe', description = 'Detailed restoration work done' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ConservationRecords SET condition_report = 'Good condition, no visible damage' WHERE sculpture_id = 2
UPDATE SculptureRecords SET sculpture_name = 'Statue of Liberty', restoration_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE record_id = 1;

UPDATE Sculpture_tbl SET artist_name = 'John Doe', year_created = 2005, material_used = 'Marble' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Sculpture_tbl SET sculpture_name = 'David', artist_name = 'Michelangelo' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Restoration_Record_tbl SET restoration_description = 'Extensive restoration work done on the sculpture.' WHERE sculpture_id = 1 AND restored_by = 'Restoration Studio A';
UPDATE Sculptures SET current_location = 'Museum A', creation_year = 1975 WHERE id = 12345;
